wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Louis Wreford-Brown DSO RN (born August 1945) is a retired British Royal Navy officer.

response: Conqueror, commanded by Commander Chris Wreford-Brown, was deployed during the Falklands War, setting sail from Faslane Naval Base on the Gareloch in Scotland on 3 April 1982, one day after the Argentine invasion. Conqueror arrived in the exclusion zone around the Falkland Islands 21 days later and was ordered to scan the area for Argentine shipping, particularly the aircraft carrier Veinticinco de Mayo ("25th of May").
During 1988 and 1989 she was commanded by Captain Chris Wreford-Brown.
* Chris Wreford-Brown (born 1945), retired Royal Navy officer
